topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5497a85e6368724922bf1600#post_5497a85e6368724922bf1600
Well, I'm a brony obviously, although since they removed MLP from Youtube I haven't watched it since I hate dailymotion. I write for a living. I live in a house in the mountain and I can't get reception. Right now, I'm in the process of overcoming my fears in order to promote my books. 

I like to go to the movies, dancing, video games, board games, old fashioned pen and paper role playing games.
